COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2
STRING: I had a quick lunch, slung my Fortelle over my shoulder,
and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe
STRING: I ignored the constant rain, and hurried to Torta's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114
STRING: The area of the house I was heading to existed
alongside rows of apartments built for students like me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: There were many charming old buildings, and the one
that Ninna bought to live here was no exception.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: It was pretty close to my apartment, so I could walk
there in five minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: I walked toward the somewhat large building across
the way, sandwiched between two thin alleys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: [Torta] “Just a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202
STRING: [Torta] “Come in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218
STRING: I was greeted by a smiling Torta, and went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you for inviting me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: I took a step into the room with its nostalgic smell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: It was the kind of place that made me feel homesick
every time I came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Ninna] “Is that you, Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: I heard a chair creak, and Ninna called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... It's been a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: Sat in a bentwood chair, Ninna rocked slowly as she
turned to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312
STRING: [Ninna] “Come closer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: I moved closer as she asked, and touched her deeply
wrinkled hand on the arm rest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Ninna] “You've gotten so big.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x372
STRING: [Chris] “It's only been half a year. I can't grow that fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: [Ninna] “There's that adult tone again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: She said this in a graceful voice, and looked me in the
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: No, the truth is she was just trying to look.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: Her narrow eyes couldn't open very wide and were
clouded white. They almost couldn't see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x422
STRING: [Torta] “Right. It doesn't suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: A long time ago, I called Ninna Grandma as Torta did,
and she still talked about it like it was yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x458
STRING: I didn't mind being treated that way at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: But I was getting to the point where being treated like a
child was humiliating. I was also at an age when I had
to be polite to an extent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, it's been a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: [Ninna] “That's fine. You brought your Fortelle, does
that mean you'll play for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c2
STRING: [Chris] “If you don't mind my Fortelle playing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Ninna] “I'm sure you've gotten even better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I can't make any guarantees.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: [Ninna] “You always say the same thing. You need to
have more self confidence, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: [Torta] “He can't. I mean, he's been like this for so long.
He can't change so easily.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x594
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Umm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c6
STRING: [Torta] “It's a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5dc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Ninna] “Hee-hee. You're the same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62c
STRING: [Torta] “Just like I said, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64a
STRING: [Ninna] “You too, Torta. You're always quarreling with
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x686
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: [Ninna] “Hey, you're going to play me something today,
yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: [Chris] “If it's a song I've practiced.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d0
STRING: I answered her and started setting up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6dc
STRING: It only happened a few times a year, but playing at
Ninna's house like this had become customary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f2
STRING: Ninna also frequently went to performances at the
Concert Hall, so it was a little embarrassing for students
like us to perform for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: But Ninna looked forward to my visits more than
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x728
STRING: So I told her about the happenings in my life, and then
played the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75a
STRING: [Ninna] “That song you played for me last time... What
was it called?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x796
STRING: [Torta] “Last time... I need more information. Last time
for you could be many years ago, Grandma.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: [Chris] “If so, then for now I'll try playing all the songs
I've played here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Torta] “You're uncommonly eager. You didn't even
complain. I'm impressed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm always serious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83a
STRING: [Ninna] “That's right. Chris has always been serious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x882
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'm sorry. I told a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: I expected Torta to complain, but being affirmed like
that, I felt more guilty than embarrassed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: [Ninna] “Hee-hee. If you two will play for me, anything is
fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x910
STRING: [Torta] “Don't say it in the first place if you're going to
apologize.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x926
STRING: [Chris] “Your reply was too late, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x958
STRING: [Torta] “Don't try to blame me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96e
STRING: Torta elbowed me in the shoulder, then got ready to
sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Torta] “Mm, aaah, aaah.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ce
STRING: I already did some light vocal warm-ups, so I'm ready
any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be ready right away, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0e
STRING: Ninna slowly leaned back in her chair, making herself
comfortable in order to listen to the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: Even that behavior was nostalgic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: Slightly regretting not visiting for so long, I vowed
secretly to play more seriously than normal today to
make up for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa52
STRING: First, I lightly arranged my fingers on the keys and
struck a chord.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: The clear sound of the Fortelle rang out in the room,
and Ninna faced me slightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: The house itself was large, and there wasn't anyone in
the area that would complain about the noise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: I repositioned myself slightly so Ninna could hear better,
and faced Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa8
STRING: Except for practicing for the graduation recital, I almost
never played with Torta apart from these occasions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: That's why I was a little nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Chris] “Any time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, just play anything I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb12
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... ＊sigh＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: I let out a big breath, and met Torta's eyes directly in
front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb34
STRING: We didn't particularly need a signal to start.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: I breathed in at the same time as her, then gradually
struck the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb98
STRING: I played popular songs we learned when we first came
to the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbae
STRING: Ninna was motionless as if she were sleeping, just
letting the waves of music wash over her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc6
STRING: But our repertoire of songs was exhausted in less than
an hour, so all we could do was play songs we'd heard
somewhere, or songs we learned when we were kids.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe8
STRING: Even so, it wasn't a problem as long as Torta knew the
songs, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: Sometimes I would start to play a song she didn't know
the lyrics to and I could do nothing but keep playing,
and Ninna would laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc20
STRING: Then Torta would get angry at me afterward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: But... Those moments were fun, too. I was able to just
enjoy the music for the first time in a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: As the three of us rested after dinner, the time passed
quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: All we ended up talking about were the goings on in
my life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: Ninna wanted to know trivial things that I wouldn't talk
about even to Torta, and we ended up talking until very
late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcce
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, it's getting late; I should be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris, thank you so much for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd16
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... I'm sorry I can't visit more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2c
STRING: At some point my tone had gotten familiar, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd38
STRING: Every time I came I tried to be polite, but I was always
this familiar by the time I went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd56
STRING: [Ninna] “Don't go out of your way. It's fine if you come
when you want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd82
STRING: I answered honestly, without overdoing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8e
STRING: Ninna nodded slowly, and finally took my hand once
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda4
STRING: If she had asked me to come again, I would have
happily promised to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdba
STRING: But Torta's and my relationship was complicated, so I
just couldn't say myself that I'd come again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe18
STRING: Standing in the doorway, Torta murmured at the end so
only I could hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2c
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe66
STRING: I inhaled the nostalgic smell of the room deeply one
more time, and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe94
STRING: The falling rain was cold, so I put on my coat again, and
hurried home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: [Phorni] “You're late...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home. Sorry I'm late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2a
STRING: [Phorni] “What about your reply to Arie? Do you have
time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf40
STRING: [Chris] “You're worried about our ensemble, Phorni, not
my reply to the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: [Phorni] “Mm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... I'm pretty tired today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you talking about? Hurry up and
write your reply...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: [Chris] “Thinking about tomorrow, it'll be all I can do to
write the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: [Phorni] “What?! We really can't play, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: [Chris] “Next week... We'll play twice as much, forgive
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Phorni] “I waited for you and everything...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm really sorry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109c
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr... Fiiinneee!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c8
STRING: I couldn't do anything about Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: Maybe I could play with her a little tomorrow, even
though it wasn't Sunday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry... Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1100
STRING: I didn't know if she could hear me, but I apologized
quietly, and decided to forget it for the time being.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: [Chris] “Now then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: I did talk for a long time, but I was still full from dinner,
and was struggling to stay awake while I opened the
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: Looking at the neatly lined up letters gave me a feeling
of relief, threatening to make me sleepy again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: I wanted to relax a little, so I lay on the bed to read the
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a6
STRING: Chris. No doubt it's still raining there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: The rain here last week soon stopped and the weather
is almost shamelessly nice again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e2
STRING: Sometimes I wonder how endless rain would make me
feel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: If I could take even a little of it here, I'd do so happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: I feel like I can see you laughing at me for saying
something so silly, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123e
STRING: But that's honestly how I feel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: How is the search for your graduation recital partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: I'm sorry to bring this up again, but it's the most
important thing right now, so forgive me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: Even if it's not Torta, no matter who it is, your
graduation is on the line, so it's important.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: I hope you find someone good soon and start
practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b6
STRING: It would be pretty sad to only talk about that, so I'll
write about myself a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: I started working at this bakery at the same time that
you and Torta entered the music school, so it's already
been over two and a half years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: I might have mentioned some of the details before, but I
don't think I told you officially yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1312
STRING: Anyway, I can bake bread from start to finish now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1330
STRING: I'm very busy every day, but it's fulfilling, and I think I'm
working just as hard as you, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134e
STRING: I hope I can serve you some of the delicious bread I
make someday, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: I'm eagerly awaiting that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138a
STRING: Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: Bread made by Arietta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: I didn't really want to think about food, with my full
stomach, but I was sure I could manage that much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ea
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: I set the letter by the bed, and muttered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140c
STRING: [Chris] “Wake me up a little early tomorrow... I can't
even write a reply.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143a
STRING: I buried my face in the pillow and was in dreamland in
no time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: [Chris] “Good night...”
